CLUE: Homeric legendary island of King Odysseus
FOUND IN: In Homer's epic poems, the Odyssey and the Iliad, Ithaca is described as the home of King Odysseus, also known as Ulysses, after he returns from the Trojan War

CLUE: Very old English cop, or spud scraper
FOUND IN: Peelers (British slang for police officers, after Sir Robert Peel who founded the London Metropolitan Police)
